channel.title: No Internet Connection
channel.description:
Hello,
I installed VirtualBox on Windows 8 and import Whonix-Gateway and Whonix Workstation. There is no Internet Connection in Workstation. When i run Whonixcheck on whonix-gateway, it gives me following error Whonixcheck gave up waiting Tor Circuit:not established botstrapping 5% done. tor reports.........(few more lines)
I need internet connection in workstation. how it is possible??

item.title: No Internet Connection
item.dc:creator: Saniya_Sharma
item.description:
Hello,

I installed VirtualBox on Windows 8 and import Whonix-Gateway and Whonix Workstation. There is no Internet Connection in Workstation. When i run Whonixcheck on whonix-gateway, it gives me following error
Whonixcheck gave up waiting
Tor Circuit:not established
botstrapping 5% done. tor reportsâ€¦(few more lines)

I need internet connection in workstation. how it is possible??
